TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserControl extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 提供空白控制項，可用來建立其他控制項。

span.span: Provides an empty control that can be used to create other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由擴充，繼承所有的標準位置和所需的使用者控制項的助憶鍵處理程式碼。By extending , inherits all the standard positioning and mnemonic-handling code that is necessary in a user control. 讓您能夠建立可用於應用程式或組織內的多個位置的控制項。The gives you the ability to create controls that can be used in multiple places within an application or organization. 您可以包含您要求使用者輸入，則一般資料驗證所需的所有程式碼這是一些範例電子郵件地址 （請參閱 < 範例 > 一節）、 電話號碼和郵遞區號。You can include all the code needed for validation of common data you ask the user to input; some examples of this are email addresses (see Example section), telephone numbers, and postal codes. 使用者控制項的另一個有效率的用途是只要預載或靜態項目與您常用於幾乎每個應用程式; 此的一些範例包括國家/地區、 城市、 州和辦公室位置。Another efficient use of the user control is to simply preload a or with static items you commonly use in almost every application; some examples of this are countries/regions, cities, states, and office locations. 如需有關如何撰寫自訂控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 開發自訂 Windows Form 控制項和.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以考慮建立包含使用者控制項的數個類別的命名空間，並將它編譯成一個 DLL。You might consider creating a namespace that contains several classes of user controls and compiling it into one DLL. 可以參考此 DLL，而且隨附在應用程式或組織內的所有應用程式。This DLL can be referenced and distributed with the application or all applications within an organization. 這會讓您能夠參考的使用者控制項，在許多應用程式，並節省時間的版面配置和編碼的使用者控制項所包含的項目。This gives you the ability to reference the user control in many applications and save time laying out and coding the contained elements of the user control. 使用者控制項也可以提供一致性之內或跨應用程式。比方說，所有位址資訊輸入的區塊將所有都具有相同的外觀和行為。A user control also gives you consistency within or across applications; for example, all address information input blocks will all have the same appearance and behavior. 一致性可讓您的應用程式更出色且專業的外觀。Consistency gives your application a more polished and professional appearance. > > 您也可以裝載 Windows Forms衍生類別內另一個表單，在網頁上，或在 Internet Explorer 內form 上裝載的控制項。You can host Windows Forms derived classes inside of a form, on another , inside of Internet Explorer on a Web page, or inside a control hosted on a form. > [!NOTE] > 當裝載內控制項，您無法關閉使用視覺化樣式`META`標記值`MSThemeCompatible`。When hosting a inside of the control, you cannot turn off Visual Styles using the `META` tag value `MSThemeCompatible`. 如需視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information about Visual Styles, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 請注意，針對 Smartphone 應用程式，此控制項需要 Windows Mobile 5.0 版軟體適用於智慧型手機。Note that for Smartphone applications, this control requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，可以在取得使用者資訊的多個應用程式中重複使用。The following code example creates a that can be reused in multiple applications to get user information. 此範例加入了許多控制項控制項和到來收集使用者的資訊。This example adds several controls, controls and an to the to gather the user's information. 此外，在驗證使用者的電子郵件地址事件的而物件用來提供使用者意見反應，如果資料驗證失敗。Additionally, the user's email address is validated in the event of the and the object is used to give the user feedback if the data fails validation. 程式碼要編譯成 DLL，以供其他應用程式中的參考。The code is intended to be compiled into a DLL for reference in other applications. [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不建立的執行個體。You do not typically create an instance of . 若要建立您自己的使用者控制項類別，繼承自類別。To create your own user control class, inherit from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體衍生類別，`MyCustomerInfoUserControl`中的範例 > 一節建立類別概觀。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`, which was created in the example section of the class overview. 使用者控制項加入至控制項，並具有其屬性設定為。The user control is added to a control and has its property set to . 接著會新增至。The is then added to a . [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法辨識的控制項屬性將函式，不過已設為。Controls that do not recognize the property will function as though was set to . 辨識的所有控制項屬性，根據預設，擴大以符合可用空間，但將不會縮減所指定的值以下屬性。All controls that recognize the property will, by default, grow to fit available space, but will not shrink below the value specified by the property.

A member of the enumeration.
The default value for is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoValidateChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的自訂控制項不會執行任何自己的驗證，您必須知道開發人員使用您的控制項已變更時屬性，因此您可以據此變更控制項的驗證行為。If your custom control performs any of its own validation, you will need to know when a developer using your control has changed the property so that you can change your control's validation behavior accordingly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`UserControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#641)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#641)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，控制項有下凹的 3d 外觀。When the property is set to , the control has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance. 若要顯示一般的細框線，請設定屬性設。To display a flat, thin border, set the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Load As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於控制項第一次可見之前。

span.span: Occurs before the control becomes visible for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件來執行工作，例如配置控制項所使用的資源。You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬於的 MDI 子表單，事件就會發生子表單會顯示每一次。If the is part of an MDI child form, the event will occur each time the child form is shown. 在此情況下，您應該將任何單次初始化程式碼放在而不是事件處理常式。In this case, you should put any one-time initialization code in the instead of a event handler. > [!CAUTION] > 就會發生事件時的控制代碼建立。The event occurs when the handle for the is created. 在某些情況下，這可能會造成事件發生一次以上。In some circumstances, this can cause the event to occur more than one time. 例如，就會發生事件時載入時，一次如果控制代碼會重新建立。For example, the event occurs when the is loaded, and again if the handle is recreated. (控制代碼會重新建立的一種方法是呼叫方法。)負責事件發生超過一次，您應該將初始化程式碼中任何一次建構函式，而不是事件處理常式。(One way that a handle is recreated is by calling the method.) To account for the event occurring more than one time, you should put any one time initialization code in the constructor instead of a event handler. 此外，您不應該新增資料繫結至在事件處理常式。In addition, you should not add data bindings to the in a event handler. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`UserControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#642)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#642)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnCreateControl() cil managed

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立控制項之後，但之前就會看到控制項第一次，就會發生事件。The event occurs after the control is created, but before the control becomes visible for the first time. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
